actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to allow individuals a deduction for amounts paid for commuting to and from work on public transportation systems.

summary.text: Allows individuals a tax deduction under the Internal Revenue Code for amounts paid for commuting to and from work on public transportation systems. Excludes from gross income the value of public transportation tickets furnished by a corporation to its employees.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to allow individuals a deduction for amounts paid for commuting to and from work on public transportation systems.
